channel.title: How do i make my server NO-IP? please help :)
channel.description:
hey, im having aproblem making my server a no-ip.org server..bceause i dont really like it on hamachi..
so can somebody please explain how i do it? like in step by step?
[b]also[/b] my dad said i cant port forward because he works through the router for his work, so does my mom, my dads a programmer and my mom is around the clock working, so i cant mess with router, is tehre another way?
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~++flargie++~~~~~~~~~~~~ pelase help!
